about_the_game:
Discover "Thorgal" - an action adventure game with RPG elements, set within the beloved universe of the iconic comics crafted by Grzegorz Rosiński and Jean Van Hamme. Experience a timeless tale cherished by fans, offering a modern and immersive adaptation that will enrapture both newcomers and devoted enthusiasts alike.

Challenge the gods themselves

Assume the mantle of Thorgal Aegirsson, the enigmatic Viking warrior whose mysterious origins set the stage for an epic odyssey fraught with peril and intrigue. With enemies both mortal and divine lurking at every turn, including formidable adversaries drawn from the rich tapestry of Norse mythology, the fate of Thorgal and his family hangs in the balance.

Based on the classic comic book series

"Thorgal" sets out not only to captivate existing fans of the series but also to beckon newcomers, drawing in fantasy enthusiasts and RPG aficionados with its rich storytelling and immersive gameplay. Prepare to embark on an unforgettable adventure where legends are forged, destinies are tested, and the legacy of Thorgal awaits to be written anew.

name: Thorgal
short_description: Play as a mysterious child of the stars and stand against the gods themselves! Dive into Norse mythology, face enemies both human and divine, and conquer dangerous monsters in meticulously crafted landscapes. Join Thorgal on his journey and carve your legend in this immersive experience!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish*, Russian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
